choices: The Devil Makes Work For Idle Wishers
1.content:
"George your so slow, can't you peddle that bike !" yelled Becky

"Damn it woman! I was a football player not an Olympic runner." thought George as he worked to a sweat climbing the steep hill.

At last he reached the peak and wiped the sweat from his face. "You don't have my bulk to move up the mountain!" said George still huffing.

Becky smiled at her Bow, "Your getting out of shape sitting in that bank! You need the fresh air and a lot of physical work, or you will get fat and lazy, Georgie' Boy!" chidded Becky with a grin.

Still sweating George layed the bike down and found a place to sit on a stump left after some old tree was huen down and made to other things. As he sat and listened to Becky ramble his fingers felt something odd.

Looking down, George spied what seemed to be a silver ring embedded into the outer ring of the tree trunk. As he took out his mini pocket knife from the bank he worked it made the job easy to cut out the ring.

"George, what are you doing?" asked Becky seeing him begin to pick at the stump with his little knife.

Flecks of slivers popped this way and that till out of the trunk came a bright silver ring. George held the ring up to get a good look as Becky reached to grab it.

"No tis' mine, I found it, I dug it out of the tree trunk, it's mine!" grumbled George.

"Ok dear, OK! The more you work in the banking business the greedier' you become!" grumbled Becky back.

The morning turned to afternoon as the two lovers biked about the Smokey Mountain's Park. It wasn't till the two reach Lumberman's Gap trader's post that the facts of George's find came to light.

The many shops and booths made to capture the money of simple minded hiker's and biker's offered a place to buy junk. As George handed some money to a old Indian woman she saw the silver ring on his hand.

Asking about the ring the woman told a story about a young girl from Europe coming to the mountains and being given a silver ring. As in most old fables the ring had powers and as the girl walked amoung the forest trees she wished to livea hundred years as part of the green lush forest. As when her wish was made known to the world she was touching one of the great Elm trees in the forest. Her ring glowed and both lover and girl watched as feet turned to roots and arms became bowes. A short scream and she was a Elm sapling to be a part of the forest. The ring was embedded into the bark of her tree and neither her or the ring were seen every again.

Becky looked at George and both smiled at the old Indian for the story had captured their imaginations.
1.title: A 21 year old male

11.content:
As both walked out of the trading post to stand on the boardwalk, Becky gripped the hand of her man.

"Some story!" said George.

Becky smiled and looked past George up the street to see the arrival of one rugged ole' stage coach. As the two walked the boarded sidewalk together Becky needed to check out each shop. As yet the two had not had any lunch and George felt more than weary.

As Becky entered the Stage Coach office with plans of buying tickets for a tweleve mile ride through the forest and grassy pastures, George stood looking about for a hot dog stand. Even as he stood there the coachdriver took sacks of grain out to feed his four dappled gray steeds.

Each horse was given a bag half full of grain with the bag hung from the top of each big head. George watched as with each exhaled breathe the dust and flacks puffed into the air from out the sacks.

"Feeding them before a run?" asked George.

"Yea sure, they work like you and I or even a steam engine, got to feed the fire to make the coach move!" said the Coachdriver with a nice and friendly smile.

Becky was still asking the history of this coach when George felt the pit of his stomac growl. Stepping down off the boardwalk he stood almost face to face with the friendly stagecoach horses.

"Big aren't they!" said George turning to look up at the driver now sitting in his seat high above.

"Yup, bigger than what might have been used way back when but just fine for our short trips at a slow pace. Percheron and some other breed mixed they work willingly and have great strength and stamina!" announced the driver.

Smoothing his hand down the broad hairy neck of a monster of a horse, George felt the strength. Moving to almost face the beast he put both hands to each side of the strong neck and looking up at the driver announced, "I almost died coming up the mountain on a bike! Wish, I wish I had the strength and stamina of this beauty!"

The driver leaned forward as the silver ring seemed to glow bright and yellow. Just as suddenly George stood very erect of stance, almost as if hit by lightning. Then he slumped.
11.title: Oh to be

111.content:
The sudden noise out in the street brought Becky to see what was up. Yet up was not where George was, he was down and out cold on the street.

Pushing people to one side Becky knelt down by her best friend.

"George, George?" called Becky but with little response.

Eyes closed and being limp he looked as if he's had a stroke.

"Back up this rig!" yelled a Medic as he opened his red box.

The coachdriver pulled on the reins and called to his lead horses to back up. "Sampson, back Sampson back!"

As the reins tightened and the big horses scrambled with short steps the coach backed up to give room for treating George.

A screaming whinnie suddenly roared out of Sampson as he strained to look down at George laying in the street. Meanwhile as the name of Sampson was called, George's eyes went wide and he tried to roll up onto all fours.

A scramble of Paramedics and onlookers tried to control the fierce tries of the injured man to get up and run away. As arms and legs flagged in every direction the silver ring flew into the air.
111.title: Scream and Scramble

1111.content:
George stood pondering the strange sight playing out into front of him. Was he dead and looking down at himself like in the Tv movies? No, he saw his body move, eyes flash of fear, and then try to scramble away on a fours. This was crazy, a dream, but no he was awake
feeling, hearing, a pungent taste of metal in his mouth. The cool mountain breeze flushed over him and chills of sensual delights touch him all over.

Becky's calls to him beconed him to speak but each time he tried the most horendous sound emitted from his throat. As he stood there looking on these odd sensations seemed to suggest different body movements, shaking his head voilently, stomping a foot hard, flicking his tail whether from itchy flies or just to stroke a sensual part.

"Tail!"

The word had a meaning but as quick as the word was thought of, it seemed as so much else to just fade into some vast dark space. Odd, so very odd the feelings about himself as if he was not clothed. Yet then too as he thought of clothes the meaning of such also drifted off.

"George!"

That's my name he kept thinking, but the word Sampson also brought back fond thoughts of care and food. A turn to his right found himself face to face with one of those big horses. Even as he looked the strange hues of red, blue and powder shades whites took the place of vast colors which he'd known before.

The jingle of chains and rings of steel, plus the restraint of movement by dark colored straps made his movements short but often quick. As he looked into the horses face it opened it's mouth, showing great green teeth and gums. As if to bite him the animal made a lunge for him face.
1111.title: New Views

choices: Figure a way out of this
11111.content:
A quick jolting lunge to dodge the attack made stranger yet notions of touching on his rear. A turn to look behind only made the mixed signals and sights make George afraid of what he saw and felt.

"Calm down George let the Paramedics help you, George, George!" said Becky as she fussed with him yet he felt not her touch. Nor did he feel the touching of those trying to desperatly hold him down. Indeed he was standing several yards away.

It was then that the passion play which was going on before all there brought the Coach driver to take a solid hold of the dark straps which bound George's face and head.

"Easy Sampson, easy boy, we can't leave until this trouble is over!" said the Coachman to George as the words strived for meanings.

George was much less delighted that the odd touching of the Coachman as he kept touching George's face, cheek, and rubbing his hand over lips and nose. Feeling angry George snorted hard and made a grunting whinnie as if being very disturbed.

"This guy must be gay to keep touching me so!" thought George in a sudden fit of mental language. A yank of his head back only brought a jerking tug from the Coachman's well gripped hand.

The sight of himself being loaded onto a gurney and rolled off to be placed aboard an ambulance met with some true wonders in George's thoughts. An uneasy feeling about the happenings brought the flicking of the appendage he knew wasn't his.

The crowd began to walk away as the scene was over and all went about there own business. It was then that George felt and heard what part of him said was normal and he thought as something of pure terror.

Crack went the coach drivers whip and a hardy, "Geedie Up!"

Suddenly the horses behind and to his right began to move, making him move as well. Tugging pulling his own he was somehow part of this team, "but that isn't right!" or so he thought.

"Horses and animals pull coaches and he was human, a free man!" the idea's poured through his mind. Yet with each step and more and more the team moved on down the road. Thoughts were rapidly becoming grouped into desires mixed with fear and the passion to run from the whip drove George to run with mindless haste.

Snuffing and snorting he ran in time with the horses. George amidst the fear of that whip admired his stamina, and the brute strength he felt as muscles works and legs ran over the hard ground.

As forest opened to grassey plains he had a desire to taste the grass but that damn whip drove him to fearing it's sound and touch. His vision and colors bade him pay attention to the road ahead and pay little thought to what be on either side of where he was going. A square pad blocked his view of the horse beside him and he wanted to look back and beg the driver to stop.

The yell of the driver drove him and he was sure the other on. As road and miles went by he again saw the buildings of the town and had a inner feeling about his safety there.

A yell from the Coachman, "Whoe, whoe, whoe there Sampson whoe!"

As the coach came to a halt the huffing breath of tired animals filled George's ears. Even as he felt the sweat on his body chill from the cool mountain air he saw much to his wonder the approach of the Coachman himself.

"Best run yet ole' stud! I think you need a reward after today's work, how about you and Mona here making a little whoopie!" said the man.

George looked to where the man seemed to point and only saw that large angry mare that tried before to take a bite. Crazy as this all was the feeling of the man's words and suggestion was making George get erect.

"What!" George thought as he felt his penis seemingly fall out into the chilled air.

Looking to one side and then the other George saw people point and some laugh at his open erection. "He'd never had such a happening before! Why becky never said anything since the monster was kept under wraps. Oh, but now his monster was out in the open for all to see! No man would allow himself to be defiled so in public, he was George.....George....he was....he ....?"

Looking again forward the Coachman patted George's face again. "Time for another good run there my Sampson!"

"George, George Sampson that's me!"
11111.title: Thats me

choices: A Coachman and the ring of body swapping
111111.content:
George went about the business of being the prime stallion in the lead of his team. Round trip after trip, after trip till sweating and dust covered he was at last led to the stables.

Aching muscles strong as they may be were still used that day leaving George tired and willing to rest. A rubdown and brushing almost bade him to fall asleep standing up. As we know horses don't stand up and sleep but might doze as humans do from time to time.

Dusk was coming and George felt very mixed about what or even where he was. The sight of the Coachman coming with a rein made him perk up and take notice.

"Ok big boy to the corral for tonight, Mona is waiting and looking more than willing." he said as if a ignorant stallion might understand.

Yet some of the words and idea's came through the murky mind which was the new George. Prancing with some inner delight George followed the man. As they neared the corral a heady scent of mare in heat stunned the stallion's mind. Urges, a rush of sensual lusts and urges to dominate over this mare came as a flood of wild passions.

George stood there getting more erect with every second. Little did he care now as he did earlier in the day. Occurance after each hard round of pulling the coach brought a need for relief, and with it his embaressment faded. George was also willing and very ready to enjoy his well endowed loins.

Even before the Coachman walked away George was high in the air. Mounted high and deep he stood feeling primal urge to procreate and so he did as nature demanded.

The night was filled with encounter after encounter with the big mare. George was never a mad lover of women but this was an experiance he'd look back on with definate pride.

Morning brought on renewed sights and sounds. A tired and well pleased stallion stood as the Coachman prepared him for another full day of pulling the heavy coach. As if his wild night of passion would not be the final straw in erasing any human memories, another full day as a team leader would also take it's toll.

Care for Becky had with his friendly encounter vaporized. George was also not thinking, just reacting as a beast simulated by things around him and the fears which drove his body down the dusty road. Soon enough even the name George would slip from his mental grasp and only the name Sampson would stick as if he'd been a horse all his life.
111111.title: The View

choices: Powers have their twists and turns
Or may be a change of lives ourselves
1111111.content:
The pay scale of a coach driver was not great as Ron hanson had learned. It wasn't till he witnessed the body swap between a man named George and his prize team stallion. As the ring jolted from George's hand, Ron jumped down from his lofty perch atop the coach. A quick scoop and he had the bobble, while wishing to learn it's power.

The paid help of a Indian medicine woman, and her knowledge of the ring was the way to make him richer than rich.

As weeks and months passed Ron watched his stallion go from a creature of almost human hygiene to one of a basic beastial attitude. In fact he was learning himself how to bend the ring into making him money.

A call to one time friend and partner John Orszack brought maffia business out to meet Ron and his ring of power. Time after enriching time men and women which the crime bosses wanted killed were offered continued life by Ron and John.

One by one the person was shown horses, cows, or lessor types of fam animals. Then place on their shaky knees before the animal the ring placed on a finger, the offer of a quick death or life as an animal was offered. Once done the animal feeling very disturbed was led away. A wild and insane human remainded to be shown to the crime boss who sent them for treatment. Money flowed for this terrible service!

Ron and John worked both sides of the street. As they asked for payment for the services from crime management, and then offering a better grade of life for those to be interned in the beastial form. Each doomed person was shown a filthy hog or sow, then told if they coughed up some money the higher and cleaner life forms could be considered.

Laugh the two men would as men and especially women would plead to be anything other than reduced to a swine life and form. Men often chose horses or bulls, as ladies of the street preferred sheep and goats, the high society women begged and paid to live out their lives as pretty heifers, mares, or even one wished to be a Dobberman bitch.

Once the swap was made the ring retrieved from the insane human with an animal's mental state gave ability back to Ron and John for more profits.
1111111.title: A Coachman and the ring of body swapping

11111111.content:
It was a cloudy afternoon when the phone rang and a gravely voiced man asked for John. As his caller put in an order for dispensing of a 30 year old blonde, a person who while giving and enjoying had heard too much to be trusted.

"I want it done with some flare, she is to be melded with a Palamino. I want her to have blone hair which she so treasures, for the rest of her life, understand me John?" said the crime boss JoJO.

It was agreed for the sum of twenty thousand dollars she would take up retirement at the local riding academy.

Two days later the limo pulled up and to surprise John and Ron out stepped JoJO and a tall, very well endowed, blonde bimbo. JoJO, himself dressed looking like a Coney Island ice cream huckster and his doll with a tight short sweater that bulged from her sylicone chest. A mini skirt so short one could see some underbrush when she leaned over to kiss JoJO's balding head. Then too her knee high black patent leather boots having five inch heals, wow what a B-i-m-b-o !

"Hey Johnny boy how's it hang'in?' said JoJO as he walked over to shake the hand of power.

"Just fine JoJO, is she the one?" asked John.

"Hey darlin' where's this special blonde pony you want me to see?" asked the l-a-d-y.

John looked toward Ron and rolled his eyes as if he couldn't believe this one, for sure. "Please follow me and we shall pay our pet Palamino a visit." suggested John as the Lady, JoJO, Ron, and John headed down the path toward the riding stable.

John and Ron watched JoJO as he looked very nervous. "Not feel'in so good there JoJO ole' man?" asked Ron with a sleezy smile.

As the Lady and John continued down the path he turned with a tough mean look to Ron. "I'm paying good money for your service and unless you want to feel my wrath I suggest you cut the qute remarks. I happen to be very fond of Schinelle' we had a fun time together. You see I got partners and they wanted to bump her off, you know a shot to the head! That was not what I want for her, she has known me like few ever did, and I want her to live on even if her human body doesn't, understand?" questioned JoJO.

"Yea sure JoJO, we meld Schinelle into a Palamino mare, then you put a bullet through her pretty human head to satisfy your partners, simple JoJO!" said Ron still with an attitude problem.

The two men argued some more as they walked down to meet John and Schinelle. As the rounded the bend there next to the corral fence stood Schinelle petting a yearling Palamino mare.

"Oh JoJO, she's so nice and soft, sweet, can she be mine, oh please, oh please, please, please, JoJO, JoJO, please Darlin'" begged, nagged, and pleaded Schinelle.

"Show her fella's and do it quick!" said JoJO.

"I was right, Darlin' you want me silent, your going to have them kill me and what of the pretty blonde pony, her too! Oh you monster! I give you the best years of my life, go through five operations to make my breast look like jugs! I entertain those mobsets you call partners, they pinch, prod, and finger fuck me day and night! Oh but for the love and touch of my JoJO I'd do anything, so now we must kill the one lady in your life who was more than just another hooker!" slice, diced, and hammered Schinelle at JoJO.

"Your ring my dear!" said John.

"RING!"

"Ring, JoJO, you want to marry me?" Oh sweetie I'm so sorry for what your love'in munchkin said! Your going to marry me and we can live happily ever after mister and misses, Schinelle and Mister JoJO, ahh what in your last name darlin?" wondered Schinelle.

"A Donkey might have been more worthy!" chidded Ron.

"Lets get this over with!' said JoJO as he grabbed Schinelle's left hand, and reached it over to touch the forehead of the Palamino yearling mare.

"JoJO, No man!" yelled John, but too late as the ring glowed and the trade was made.

Suddenly the Palamino mare bolted away from the fence. At the same instant Schinelle dropped to her knees. A JoJO big boss of crime stood shaking from head to foot. In a quick action his head turned toward John, eyes wild, teeth clinched, fingers curled like claws.

"Oh fuck a duck I'm Schinelle!" said her voice but with JoJO residing inside her wonderous body.

A Palamino mare looked on, blinked her eyelids and flicked her tail in smooth easy sashays.

John turned to Ron, then looked at Schinelle, then he turned toward JoJO as the man attacked like the wild beast which was now in his body.

Ron as usual was prepared for the worst. As JoJO with clenched claws was ready and willing to kill out of wild fear, a 50,000 volt tasser hit his thigh and down in a lump went JoJO's body.

"Thanks partner!" said John.

"What the fucking hell am I going to do as Schinelle?" she said but with JoJO's mental self stuck in a bimbo's body.

Ron looked to the Palamino mare who seemed well and happy to be as she was. Then he turned to Schinelle, who stood next to John with JoJO's slumped body at his feet. A grim look on his face he then said, "What a revolt'in predicament this turned out to be!"
11111111.title: Powers have their twists and turns

choices: The need to explain to Kevin and Kyle
111111112.content:
JoJo - Schinelle stood there eying his girlfriend then a mare, and began understanding how much a woman feels love for a man differently than did he for her as an object of his sexual pleasures.

"What now, can we make use of the ring to transfer me back to being the real me and give the horse a body she can learn to like, and do it soon before some of the boys try to kill this hot horny body I am in?"

Ron looked at John and he twitched his head to eye first at lovely Schinelle and then to his partner. "Ah no, or not yet, maybe in a day or so when the ring recharges or if the ring allows a secondary transfer, to be quite truthful, this is all new to me!"

John just stood there and shook his head, as JoJo being inside the hot dolly body of Schinelle took to a pose of looking angered at his situation.

A shrill whinny from the pasture came out of Schinelle, she having paid all her attention to her body and hearing that JoJo resided inside her human form, she forgot not to keep her winking mare rump away from the stables' many stallions. As unseen by all, a tall Percheron stallion had leaped the pasture fence with grace and ease, he by then was sniffing the golden rump with a swishing white tail and winking lips of a equine vulva.

John dashed toward the fence but before he could jump the fence and chase away the stallion, Percheron stud known as Mr. Hoover rose to the occasion and mounted Schinelle the mare. A higher shrill whinny came from the pretty Palomino as that large girthed stallion shaft pressed at as slide between and sank deep inside the horny mare.

"Hey Schinelle, welcome now to living your life here at Sunrise Farms, as we here are all friendly, especially the stallions to our mares!" John said, as smiled at the golden mare, he seeing Schinelle bearing her teeth from the feeling of the massive draft horse maleness doing to her what JoJo tried so often, but not with such mastery of the manly male essence, as could a stallion.

Just then the JoJo human body began to stir, as groaned, Ron there forgetting what his boss said he wanted to try, as re-do. Ron pulled out his mighty 38 caliber and pointed it at the forehead of the wild eyed man, and without any concern, he pulled the trigger, killing the big boss, dead!

"Ron no," John yelled, but it was all over in a few seconds.

Ron looked down at the face of JoJo, the top half of the head above the eyebrows a mass of red mush.

Jojo hiding inside the body of his girlfriend Schinelle then screamed and covered her face with those petite hands.

"Why," John asked of Ron, as Ron then pointed his gun toward Schinelle.

"It makes it so easy, as the bosses want Schinelle dead, and with the boss body as dead, his girlfriend as soon dead, it leaves me in control of our portion of the downtown mob, you see my point?" Ron said to John as both men then begin to leer at dear kindly Schinelle with a manly mind unsettled in a female body.

"What about Kevin Rooste, or his brother Kyle, they need to be told as asked when ideas and plots are not the proper property of others, they might think of doing something to us!" John said to his partner in crime.
111111112.title: Friendly - Sunrise Farms

choices: Kevin and Kyle meet, greet, and act as still friends
1111111121.content:
What John felt a greater concern was the statewide boss of the crime syndicates, Kevin Rooste ruled his roost with an iron hand. Kevin and his adopted half brother Kyle had ruled the gambling and cartel sales for many years. It was by design that Kyle five years hence went into seclusion, hiding away from those who had sworn to kill him.

Kevin had agreed to the plan, but spoke of having reservations as what John and his partner as such, Ron offered a perfectly unsuspecting a hiding place for Kyle to roost quite incognito style.

The magical ring was a big help with hiding Kyle. Kyle did the final choice as where he would hide, a place what surprised his brother. John had handed to Kyle the offers as where he could hide away with relative ease. Making use of the ring, Kyle allowed his mental transference into the brute form of a yearling Black Angus bull. As after the transfer was completed, and Kevin took the sedated body of his half brother back to the city, while parked along a city street some paid gunman walked past the parked car and fired six bullets into the head and chest of what was, just hours previous then Kyle Rooste.

Kevin learned to like ruling alone the mob syndicate, as he failed to aid his brother returning to being again human and left him as a bull for five years.

John remained true to Kyle, as once each month he would take the bull from the pasture to the barn-stables and house him there, giving Kyle time alone to clear his mind from living life as a wild and sexual beast. John would talk with Kyle, reminding him to use his brain for something better than a battering-ram to fend away other challenging bulls wishing to breed. John would talk and pose questions, he asking Kyle to respond by pawing of the right fore-hooves to signify a yes commented answer, or the use of the left fore hooves as a No answer.

John began to feel jealous of his bullish friend, as much wishing verbally and openly to his friend as partner Ron, suggesting for someday, John would like to be transferred and be then a bull, permanently.

Ron was not favorable of his partner actively wishing he could someday be transferred into the embodiment of a beef producing bull. He went as far as to allow John to try a transfer, while keeping the beastly inhabited human body kept sedated until a second transfer was completed some two weeks later. As John did trade bodies with a Shorthorn breed bull, he endeavored with herd breeding of cows during that seasonal time of cows in estrus.

John returned to being human but continued his delighted practice of leaping pasture fences and staying by night with the cows, avidly mating with then the heifer what were not too tall to dominate.

Ron and John felt a similar concern as what Kevin would do if he knew his adopted brother Kyle were set free from his lifetime adventure being a herd-sire bull.

Limo driver Chester was tricked into inciting the ring to transfer him, making of the black man a black bull. He too became quickly elated with passionate desires for cow rumps and weathered tough cow vulvas. Indeed the ring was a credit to its owners. Used to hide people, and give then John his fun time learning well what it is like when being a bull caught in a time of rut.
1111111121.title: The need to explain to Kevin and Kyle

choices: Schinelle and Ron gain on each the other
Ron dies by the hands of his Boss
1111111122.content:
Speaking with that squeaky high-pitched as tinny tone of the Schinelle voice, JoJo recalled how many times he having to listen to his girlfriend speak, he shuddered from hearing her mind talk. Stuck for then in the body of a sex-doll model, JoJo stood feeling helpless, had he his male masculinity of self he could stop Ron from killing him, easy!

"Look here, you know who I was and of who I am, and if you spare my life, I have stashed away a fortune, I would then share it with you as the price to letting me live; even as in this strange feeling bodily form." JoJo said as suggesting, offering a ransom to his possible murderers.

John looked at Ron and both simultaneously shrugged their shoulders as if to say, "Why not give it a try."

"OK Schinelle, and Schinelle is what we will continue to refer to being you when he converse. Not a sole would believe what happened here today as a possible reality. What JoJo must come to terms with is that for as long as you may continue to live, you are a woman now, a lusty sex model, and supposed by all who knew Schinelle before today, knew her as a ditsy blonde!

Then too, we shall load your dead body into your car and give it a fiery send-off the cops will find and after an autopsy, they learn that was JoJo in the car, maybe the other crime bosses will stop looking for Schinelle!" Ron said, as he held still the gun he used to kill the JoJo with a horse mind housed where it knew not how to act, or whether to walk uprightly rather than preferring to stay on all fours.

JoJo-Schinelle was quick to agree with the plan and she/he strode closer to Ron, she walking on her five inch high spike heel shoes, and slapped him hard on his back, she congratulating him on making a wise decision.

John the usually quiet man he was, stepped close and put his hand to that of Schinelle and whispered into her ear, "You keep the ring, and when you find a form that better suits you, make use of the powers. Know too, that once changed might or might not be an absolute, it might work again, as then to favor you becoming again a man I respected."

JoJo- as then Schinelle was feeling again as he/she was the big boss. The three of them walked toward the farm house, and talking as if they were the best of friends. They were about to enter the rear door to the house when from the pasture, Schinelle the Palomino mare, gave whinnied a reminder to her lover. What she received were the uproarious laughter of three friends, as JoJo-Schinelle turned her head and looked back at the mare in the pasture.

"Give me some time to work things out, and I shall try or at least consider trying to return you to being this... horny feeling a female ditsy broad!" The crime boss said to his then mare sweetheart.

As the three entered the house, Schinelle turned to John and said into his face, "Keep the golden mare in with the stallions, and let them mate with her until she is pregnant or has learned to like them more than what I could do for her, understand me?"

"Yea sure boss, but if she gets pregnant, it might do something to her chances of return...ing to being in her body again...!" Said John, as he thinking about what the boss wanted, knew he wanted no witnesses to the situation, and especially a loose tongue female.

"I feel sweaty and this body gets all funky smelling, I need to shower before we can leave here!" JoJo - Schinelle said, but before she took a step, Ron reminded her of something quite dire. "Remember boss, the hit men are still out there looking to find and kill Schinelle, and you are now her! I suggest you reconsider and stay here at the farm of a while, at the least until the police find your car and your body as being in it.

Meanwhile you can have time to consider as who you wish to trade with and become a much younger manly new self, you have the power there on your finger, give that some considerations."

Reluctantly, JoJo - Schinelle agreed and proceeded to walk toward the bathroom and her hot shower to rid her of that funk odor JoJo hated to have to smell on Schinelle.

Ron with John returned to the dead body of JoJo lying in a pool of blood. They did as they had suggested to do, and loaded the hulk of a fat Italian body into the front seat of the stylish car. John sat then in the passenger seat and did the driving of the vehicle away from the farm and along the rural roads to a place he knew was a deadly nightmare to many cars and deaths.
